content:
I have been trying to query the value of a particular flowsheet row using Observation profile but unsuccessful. Can you please provide me any suggestion you might have? Your help is appreciated.

Regards,
Tien Thai

@Tien Thai This stream is for talking about how to teach FHIR. You might want to repost your question on the #implementers stream. Also, when you repost, it would be helpful to know more specifics about exactly what your query looked like and what problems you ran into.
